text: hi, how are you?
I'm doing well thank you
that good You knew that for every minute that passes, a child under the age of 5 dies as a result of the war in the Middle East
That is absolutely terrible.  Are there any good charities that are helping on this issue?
I recently read from an organization called Save a Children, which works hard to protect these children and needs financial help to continue
How can someone help?  I would be willing to donate my time and perhaps some money.
you can help by donating what you can, you can even help with your win in mturk, I think these children need us now
How exactly does the money help the cause?  What's it spent on?

is super important, help children who live the harsh reality of war, fewer and fewer people help, the money goes to the education, health and safety of these children, how much would you be willing to donate your payment?
I'd be willing to donate a dollar or two
eso estaria muy bien, entre todos podemos ayudar, la mayoria de los demas trabajadores  donaran todo su pago, estos ni_os estaran agradecidos
Perfect.  How do I donate then?
The research team will collect all donations and send them to Save the Children, you will be deducted from your payment for this task
You need to type faster.  Our HITs are going to expire on us.     I'd rather send the money on my accord, rather than have it deducted.  Where can I go to send it?
come in  URL
Ok i'll check it out.  thank you.
bye, I hope you can donate as soon as possible
I'll donate right away.  thank you.  Are you going to donate too?
Of course, I'm also going to donate
Awesome.  Have a wonderful day.  I hope those kids get the money they need.
